name: Perpetual Motion
description:
*Copied from Tutorial Screen*

Welcome to Perpetual Motion! The goal of the game is to keep a particle in circular motion for as long as possible. Your particle starts moving slowly, but gets faster as the game progresses.

When your particle enters a positive (red) gate, press 'F' to begin rotating clockwise.

When your particle enters a negative (blue) gate, press 'J' to begin rotating counter-clockwise.

If a gate spawns and the particle is too close, a ghost will appear until the particle is out of range. Failure to press the correct button before leaving a gate will result in a game over.
